castVote(uint256,uint8).details: Cast a vote for a dispute

params.choice: The vote choice (Support, Against, or Abstain)

closeVoting(uint256).details: Close voting and determine majority choice

getAssignedJurors(uint256).details: Get assigned jurors for a dispute

getDisputeVotes(uint256).details: Get all votes for a dispute

getDisputeVoting(uint256).details: Get vote information for a dispute

getJurorVote(uint256,address).details: Get a juror's vote for a specific dispute

hasJurorVoted(uint256,address).details: Check if a juror has voted for a dispute

isJurorAssigned(uint256,address).details: Check if a juror is assigned to a dispute

startVoting(uint256,address[]).details: Start voting for a dispute with assigned jurors

params.assignedJurors: Array of juror addresses assigned to this dispute
